Self.Wiki: Defines parameters related to fall damage.

breakpoint_1_damage_mult.Wiki: Percentage of HP lost if fall distance is at the first breakpoint.

breakpoint_2_damage_mult.Wiki: Percentage of HP lost if fall distance is at the second breakpoint.

breakpoint_3_damage_mult.Wiki: Percentage of HP lost if fall distance is at the third breakpoint.

breakpoint_4_damage_mult.Wiki: Percentage of HP lost if fall distance is at the fourth breakpoint.
